__e: It is why I said before that I thought that no one but Nicholas and myself knew about this.
This kid comes and says he's Nicholas, and then turns around and says,
What I am about to tell you no one in this world except Nicholas and myself knows.
Nicholas, I don't think my father's going to let me go America with you, especially if he has a grandchild on the way.
Nicholas's guards are not the enemy, just men doing their job.
Nicholas, I haven't a clue what this is all about, but your taste in champagne is excellent, as always.
